text: Hello is it possible to associate a form with a deal using the API?

I would create a private app in your portal and set the scopes you will need (crm.objects.contacts.read, crm.objects.contacts.write in you case) and then use the app key that provides.  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/apps/private-apps/overview>

You can capture the form submission using the form API then find the contact associated with the submission leading to associating the contact with the deal or creating a new deal.

If you provide more context then it'll be helpful :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi there,
If you have Ops Hub pro, why not creating a workflow, based on contacts.

Trigger : Based on the subsciption preference update

Action : send webhook with the payload that you need.

Would it solve your issue ?

Also, using two dynamic lists based on email subscription, and use the “event” trigger in the workflow would allow re-enrolment (one list for optin / another for optout - your contact would enter in the first one, then leave it when it opts out, to go in the second one)
I also have a solution if you don’t have Ops Hub Pro
